page.title: 12Typical Schoolday,Kingsbury
page.content: I get up at half-past seven.I get dressed in a grey cardigan,grey skirt, white blouse(school colours)and sand- als.Then I have breakfast of cereal and toast with jam.Then I wash myself, and clean my teeth.My mum or my next door neighbour takes me to school for 9 o'clock in the car.We have assembly first.We sing two hymns,say a prayer and the head talks to us.At about 9.30 we start our work of maths and writing.There is a 15 minute break at 10.45 when we play on the playground or on the field if it is dry.About 11.55 we lay the dinner tables.For lunch I normally have sandwiches, crisps,and fruit or yogurt. Lessons restart at 1.15.After reading for 30 minutes we have history,geography,R.E. science,art or craft.During each day we have P.E.or games.School ends at 3.30. Mum picks me up.
